name: City Of Serlon
description:
Controls: WASD/ Joystick

Space to Jump/Interact with Zipline/Vents

Right Click to change Camera

We would love some feedback on the movement in terms of whether it is responsive and does what you are expecting.

We want to make the movement smooth and fun, so anything that can help would be greatly appreciated.

Does the city feel big? Are the buildings well populated? Are they clustered? Are the main buidings easy to distinguish?

Also leave feedback on the camera controls and on how they feel.

Please leave your feedback in the comments.

Changelog below!

https://git.soton.ac.uk/mysn1g18/the-city-of-serlon/-/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md
